subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: With the Sabres missing their goalie due to an ankle injury, the Rangers won Saturday for the seventh time in their last nine games as Henrik Lundqvist stopped 37 of 40 shots.
snippet: With the Sabres missing their goalie due to an ankle injury, the Rangers won Saturday for the seventh time in their last nine games as Henrik Lundqvist stopped 37 of 40 shots.
